text: Thanos is a fictional character first portrayed by Damian Poitier and then by Josh Brolin, based on the Marvel Comics supervillain of the same name. He is the overall main antagonist of the Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU) franchise, serving as the overarching antagonist of The Avengers (2012), Guardians of the Galaxy (2014), and Avengers: Age of Ultron (2015) before appearing as both the main antagonist/villain protagonist of Avengers: Infinity War (2018). He returns in Avengers: Endgame (2019), the animated series What If...? (2021-2024), and the movie Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness (2022). His own main objective was to bring stability from the universe, as he believed its massive population would inevitably use up the universe's entire resources and condemn it.
